secondaries.shortDescription: Score points by type of units destroyed by a GREY KNIGHT unit : 5 for a DEAMON PRIMARCH, 3 for a DEAMON MONSTER, 3 for a DAEMON VEHICLE, 1 for any other DAEMON. -1 for each unit not below half strength

subObjectives.description: DAEMON PRIMARCH was destroyed - Score ONCE
DAEMON MONSTER was destroyed- Score ONCE
DAEMON VEHICLE was destroyed- Score ONCE
DAEMON unit was destroyed- Score ONCE
A unit of DAEMON was not under half strength

secondaries.shortDescription: score 4 victory points if one or more enemy units were destroyed by a GREY KNIGHTS model from your army that was set up on the battlefield using the Teleport Strike ability, the Teleportation Shunt Stratagem or the Gate of Infinity psychic power this battle round.

subObjectives.description: one or more enemy units were destroyed by a GREY KNIGHTS model from your army that was set up on the battlefield using the Teleport Strike ability, the Teleportation Shunt Stratagem or the Gate of Infinity psychic power this battle round.

secondaries.shortDescription: A GREY KNIGHT PSYKER can perform Purifying Ritual (Psychic Action - Warp Charge 5) on an objective. Score points based on the number purifyed this turn
